p: As mentioned above, we have implemented the variable selection method in a computationally efficient manner described in the Supporting Information ( S1 Text). We call this the Autoregressive Likelihood Ratio (ARLR) method. The efficiency of our algorithm is demonstrated using time complexity calculations in the Supporting Information ( S1 Text). We also use an alternative stopping criterion given by the AICC (corrected AIC) criterion [ 52]. Both these factors enable this method to effectively handle thousands of variables. The computationally efficient method is general and is applicable beyond disease forecasting.
